Directive.name: #ClipboardTimeout
Directive.description: Changes how long the script keeps trying to access the clipboard when the first attempt fails.

Required.name: Milliseconds
Required.description: Changes how long the script keeps trying to access the clipboard when the first attempt fails.

Directive.name: #DllLoad
Directive.description: Loads a DLL or EXE file before the script starts executing.

Optional.name: FileOrDirName
Optional.description: Loads a DLL or EXE file before the script starts executing.

Directive.name: #ErrorStdOut
Directive.description: Sends any syntax error that prevents a script from launching to the standard error stream (stderr) rather than displaying a dialog.

Optional.name: Encoding
Optional.description: Sends any syntax error that prevents a script from launching to the standard error stream (stderr) rather than displaying a dialog.

Directive.name: #Hotstring
Directive.description: Changes hotstring options or ending characters.

Required.name: NoMouse
Required.description: Changes hotstring options or ending characters.

Directive.name: #Hotstring
Directive.description: Changes hotstring options or ending characters.

Required.name: EndChars NewChars
Required.description: Changes hotstring options or ending characters.

Directive.name: #Hotstring
Directive.description: Changes hotstring options or ending characters.

Required.name: NewOptions
Required.description: Changes hotstring options or ending characters.

Directive.name: #HotIf
Directive.description: Creates context-sensitive hotkeys and hotstrings. Such hotkeys perform a different action (or none at all) depending on any condition (an expression).

Optional.name: Expression
Optional.description: Creates context-sensitive hotkeys and hotstrings. Such hotkeys perform a different action (or none at all) depending on any condition (an expression).

Directive.name: #HotIfTimeout
Directive.description: Sets the maximum time that may be spent evaluating a single #HotIf expression.

Required.name: Timeout
Required.description: Sets the maximum time that may be spent evaluating a single #HotIf expression.

Directive.name: #Include
Directive.description: Causes the script to behave as though the specified file's contents are present at this exact position.

Required.name: FileOrDirName
Required.description: Causes the script to behave as though the specified file's contents are present at this exact position.

Directive.name: #Include
Directive.description: Causes the script to behave as though the specified file's contents are present at this exact position.

Required.name: LibName
Required.description: Causes the script to behave as though the specified file's contents are present at this exact position.

Directive.name: #IncludeAgain
Directive.description: Causes the script to behave as though the specified file's contents are present at this exact position.

Required.name: FileOrDirName
Required.description: Causes the script to behave as though the specified file's contents are present at this exact position.

Directive.name: #InputLevel
Directive.description: Controls which artificial keyboard and mouse events are ignored by hotkeys and hotstrings.

Optional.name: Level
Optional.description: Controls which artificial keyboard and mouse events are ignored by hotkeys and hotstrings.

Directive.name: #MaxThreads
Directive.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneous threads.

Required.name: Value
Required.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneous threads.

Directive.name: #MaxThreadsBuffer
Directive.description: Causes some or all hotkeys to buffer rather than ignore keypresses when their #MaxThreadsPerHotkey limit has been reached.

Optional.name: Setting
Optional.description: Causes some or all hotkeys to buffer rather than ignore keypresses when their #MaxThreadsPerHotkey limit has been reached.

Directive.name: #MaxThreadsPerHotkey
Directive.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneous threads per hotkey or hotstring.

Required.name: Value
Required.description: Sets the maximum number of simultaneous threads per hotkey or hotstring.

Directive.name: #NoTrayIcon
Directive.description: Disables the showing of a tray icon.

Directive.name: #Requires
Directive.description: Displays an error and quits if a version requirement is not met.

Required.name: Requirement
Required.description: Displays an error and quits if a version requirement is not met.

Directive.name: #SingleInstance
Directive.description: Determines whether a script is allowed to run again when it is already running.

Optional.name: ForceIgnorePromptOff
Optional.description: Determines whether a script is allowed to run again when it is already running.

Directive.name: #SuspendExempt
Directive.description: Exempts subsequent hotkeys and hotstrings from suspension.

Optional.name: Setting
Optional.description: Exempts subsequent hotkeys and hotstrings from suspension.

Directive.name: #UseHook
Directive.description: Forces the use of the hook to implement all or some keyboard hotkeys.

Optional.name: Setting
Optional.description: Forces the use of the hook to implement all or some keyboard hotkeys.

Directive.name: #Warn
Directive.description: Enables or disables warnings for specific conditions which may indicate an error, such as a typo or missing "global" declaration.

Required.name: [WarningType
Required.description: Enables or disables warnings for specific conditions which may indicate an error, such as a typo or missing "global" declaration.

Required.name: WarningMode]
Required.description: Enables or disables warnings for specific conditions which may indicate an error, such as a typo or missing "global" declaration.

Directive.name: #WinActivateForce
Directive.description: Skips the gentle method of activating a window and goes straight to the forceful method.
